item.description:
Komatsubara Persecution - After returning from exile at Izu in 1264, Nichiren Shonin visited his home village in Awa Province to see his sick mother. After she recovered, Kudo Yoshitatka, the Lord of Amatsu, invited Nichiren Shonin to his residence. On their way in the eveing of November 11, Nichiren Shonin and his retainers were attacked by Tojo Kaganobu and his followers at Komatsubara. Nichiren Shonin was injured on his forehead, and his disciples, Kyoninbo and Lord Yoshitaka were killed. A cotton hat is put on Nichiren Shonin's statue on November 11 through the end of the month to heal the injury on his forehead. Everyone is welcome.
